original: 汝南安城人，西晉將領。初仕曹魏，晉代魏後漸受重用。晉滅吳之戰時，隨王渾出戰，大破東吳丞相張悌所率精兵，此戰後，東吳再無反抗之力。
text: Runan Ancheng, a general of the Western Jin Dynasty. At the beginning of the Wei Dynasty, it was gradually used after the Wei Dynasty in the Jin Dynasty. In the battle between Jin and Wu, he followed Wang Hun to fight and broke the elite troops led by Zhang Ti, the prime minister of the Dong Wu. After this war, Dong Wu no longer had the power to resist.
